description:
Now you will be the conscience of a murderer. Enter this game of decisions where you will have to decide your own path. Your actions will be key. Will you spare the lives of the citizens or will you murder them?

Enjoy this game with more than 100 choices and endless possibilities. You will be able to unlock up to 28 alternative endings.

Think carefully about your choice and advance in this intriguing game of life and death.
name: The Ripper: Serial Killers
intro: Remember that voice in your head telling you to do the wrong thing? That voice is you. Guide the protagonist and whisper in his ear whether to spare the lives of the citizens or murder them
